descriptionHTML:
** This app uses the Device Administrator permission. **
** This app does not let you turn on/off location, mobile data or hotspot. Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and above doesn't allow apps to turn location, mobile data or hotspot on/off automatically. Whenever apps try to change it you are required to address confirmation popups on the device. Since they can't be altered remotely, the app allows you to only view the status of location, mobile data or hotspot. **

Take control of your phone right from your Android Wear 2.0 smart watch. Change phone settings and toggles, launch apps, take pictures and screenshots - all without taking the phone out of your pocket!

Features
• View connected WiFi and turn it on/off.
• Alter screen brightness level and toggle auto brightness mode.
• Change ringer volume level.
• Turn screen rotation on/off.
• Turn DND (Do-Not-Disturb) mode on/off.
• View battery status and percentage.
• View location, mobile data and hotspot status.
• View all phone apps and launch them with a single tap. (Full Version)
• Turn phone flashlight on/off. (Full Version)
• Control camera to take picture and view in instantly in new screen. Ability to adjust flash mode. (Full Version)
• Take phone screenshot and view it instantly in new screen. (Full Version)
• Ring phone to find it. (Full Version)
• One touch to Lock phone. (Full Version)
• View network details WiFi and mobile signal strengths, IP and network type. (Full Version)

Note
• Please launch the phone app first after installation for initiating the connection service.
• Changing some toggles and phone settings may not work as expected on some phones because each phone with different Android version offered by different phone makers behaves differently. Write to us in case you find any issues and we'll sort it out!

Compatible with all Android Wear 2.0 Smartwatches.

Please grant all required permissions in the mobile application.
For assistance, bugs and suggestions kindly drop us a mail at appronics.technologies@gmail.com.
